name: Hight Speed Rider 3D
description:
Hight Speed Rider 3D is a fast paced motorcycle racing game with high-speed adrenaline-fueled driving you've never experienced before!
The best multiplayer traffic rider game!
Features:
- Enjoy the ultimate 3D visual effects
- Drive your motorcycle on the freeway
- a variety of epic motorcycle for you to choose
- show your driving skills in the face of various challenges
